plugin.name: Shades_Mapper_5
plugin.author: Zimbus
plugin.purpose: graphically map shades and normalize directions

muclient.triggers:
<trigger group="shades" keep_evaluating="y" match="^Somewhere in the Shades \[.*(?\d)\D*\]\.$" name="shades_brief" regexp="y" send_to="12" sequence="100" script="on_trigger_shades_brief" >
<trigger group="shades" keep_evaluating="y" match="^You follow .* (?[1-8]).$" name="shades_you_follow" regexp="y" send_to="12" sequence="100" script="on_trigger_shades_you_follow" >
muclient.aliases: <alias group="shades" name="shades_move_room" match="^(?n|ne|e|se|s|sw|w|nw|north|northeast|east|southeast|south|southwest|west|northwest|look|l|[1-8])$" regexp="y" ignore_case="y" sequence="101" script="on_alias_shades_move_room" >
